127b7: nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni btsas 'phrog pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag cag gis rab tu phyung ba rnams 'di dag gis 'phrog par byed kyis/ da ni lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis dbrog par ma 'gyur pa gang yin pa de 'dra ba rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes
127b8: gros byas so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nye dga' kun tu 'khyam pas mi lag rdum zhig/ mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag lag pa ma tshang ba
128a1: su zhig gis rab tu 'byin par bgyid/ nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa mazugs rjes rab tu phye ba yin gyis// bo bos khyod rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so//
128a2: de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum zhig kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ri rigs kyis ri dgas mi gsos/ mnyan yod rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang yab kyi spyod yul yin pas bsod snyoms rgyus la mche bar gyis
128a3: shig/ des smras pa/ mkhan po ji ltar bsod snyoms rgyu bar bgyi/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis de tsam yang mi shes sam/ ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o zhes des de'i shas thabs ni bsrang bus bcings chos gos ni tsher mas gtur te bkon/ dpung
128a4: pa g.yon par no lhung bzed kyi snod gzhag/ dpung pa g.yas par ni khar sil btags so// de nas de mnyan yod du spyod yul du zhugs pa dang bud med kyis brang ba rdungs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sus khyod rab tu byung ba'i lag pa gnyis bcad/ des smras
128a5: pa/ sring mo khyim pa nas kho bo'i lag pa chad do// rab tu byung nas chad pa ma yin no// sus rab tu phyung / des smras pa/ mkhan po nye dgas so// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma gtogs par gzhan su zhig 'di lta bu rab
128a6: tu 'byin par byed ces zer ba'i skabs de'i bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gar cung zad ci byung ba de ni dge slong lag rdum rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka'
128a7: stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lag rdum rab tu dbyung bar mi bya bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o// rab tu 'byin par byed/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// lag rngub ji lta ba de bzhin du rkang rdum dang
128a8: lag sor zlus bor 'das pa dang / mchu med pa dang / lus la mtshan can dang / rgan ches pa dag kyang de bzhin no// dge slong dag gzhon ches padag rab tu 'byin par byed nas de dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bshang gcis na rung bar byed nas
128b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// theng po dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// smad 'tshal dang / zhar ba dang / lag
128b2: sor rdum po dang / sgur po dang / mi'u thung dang / lba ba can dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa dang / rten 'phye dang / rkang 'bam dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// rab tu
128b3: 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag bud med kyis dub pa dang / khur gyi dub pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / yaza ma lug dang / gta' gam pa dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu/
128b4: dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bsdu bar bya ba'i/ bas so// // rab tu 'byung ba'i gzhi rdzogs s+ho// // gso sbyong gi gizhi'i sdom la// su
128b5: stegs can dang ka pi ni gnas dang rgyal po sbyar ba mang / / sdom la/ mu stegs can dang gsol pa dang / gnang ba dang ni 'dug pa dang / babacol spong dang zhal ta dang // bya dang gso sbyong gnas rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
128b6: rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ga lan dka'i gnas na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshen rgyal po'o khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag nang par nang par zhing bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar brtsam par 'gyur to//
128b7: de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyang nang du yang dag pa brdog par mdzad la/ dge slong yid du 'thod pa rnams kyang nang du yang dag 'jog par byed pas bdag cag
128b8: shig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa sngas kyis bdag cag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag
129a1: gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gis kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam
129a2: sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ / den se mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smras so shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang gse sbyong yod dam/ 'on te shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la yang
129a3: yod/ de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang gso sbyong yod kyi/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la na med do// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge
129a4: bsnyen rab du mang po dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gis smras pa la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/ phyir ldog par yang ma byed cing mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas/ phyir bzlog par yang ma byas par stan dag las langs nas bcom
129a5: ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te mtha' cig tu 'khod de// mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge snyen rab tu mang po dag gis gzhan mu stegs can
129a6: kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig par skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ / kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi la yang mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dang /
129a7: gso sbyong bca' bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsungs pas snang ngo // de nas rgyal po'i khab kya dge bsnyen dpa tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas
129a8: gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yid ra ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas
129b1: na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad 'dug pa dang / bya ba dang / gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin da 'dug pa dang / bya ba dang / gso sbyong la rngon bya bar rjes su gdang nas/
129b2: bkar stsal nas de dag gis 'dug pa ci lta bu yin pa dang / bya ba ci ste bu yin pa dang / gso sbyong ci lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag
129b3: srong dag khyed chur shog/ 'dug pa ni rnal 'byor te/ lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i 'thal yan chad klad bi'i sgra man chad spags pa la thug gi bar du ci ltar gnas pa dang / ci ltar byas pa bzhin du mi gtsang pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/ lus
129b4: 'di la skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / lpags pa dang / sha dang / rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang mchin pa dang / glob dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / pho ba dang / long ka dang / lgang pa dang /
129b5: mtsher ba dang / phyis dang / mchi ma dang / snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / gla ba dang / klar rgyas dang / gcin dag yod do// snyam du so sor rtogs shig/ bcom
129b6: ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag spyod yul du zhugs pa na yang rnal 'byor bsgom par byed pa na de dag glang po che 'khrul pa dang lhan cig phrad cing rta 'khrul ba dang / rkang zang pa 'khrul pa dang lhan cig phrad
129b7: nas 'gyel ba dang dub par gyur nas ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag mi mthong ngam ci 'ing po 'dri bar byed pa dang / de dag nal 'byor sgomo zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
129b8: stsal pa/ spyod yul du zhugs pas rnal 'byor sgom par mi bya'o// de dag sgo khang du rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa na yur nas ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci byed 'dra bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de
130a1: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang du rnal 'byor sgom par mi bya'o// de dag khyams su sgom par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
130a2: bka' stsal pa/ khyams su rnal 'byor sgom par mi bya'o// de dag gnas 'dra sgom par byed pa na bsam gtan bdag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyang mi thob pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
130a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du rnal 'byor sgom par mi bya'o// de dag dgon par dong ste bsgom par byed pa na chom rkun pa rnams dang / g.yon can rnams dang / seng ge rnams dang / stag rnams dang / gud rnams dang / gzig nas
130a4: kyis 'thod par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgon par rnal 'byor sgom par mi bya'o// de dag grong dang nye bar lhags nas sgom par byed pa nam dad pa rnams 'dag
130a5: pa dag ci khyed cag 'ga' zhig shi ba dang ldan par ma gyur tam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs de yal ga dag gam/ seg ngag dang / re lnga
130a6: dag gis bskor bar bya'o/ / de dag gis phyogs yal ga dag gam/ seg dag gam/ re lde dag gis bskor ba dang ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di rgyal po'i ge gon gyi ra ba'am/ la bug gi ra ba'am zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom/
130a7: ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o// de dag gis phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor ba dang / ma dad ba
130a8: rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di ma du lung ga'i ra ba 'am/ 'on te bal po se'u yi ba yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rnal 'byor sgom pa'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
130b1: stsal pa/ de lta bas na spong khang brtsig par gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis spong khang brtsig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis spong khang rnam pa ji lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis
130b2: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spong 'ad ni gnyis te/ chung ngu dang / chen po'o// chung ngu ni gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang btod pa'o// chen po ni gnas khang bcu'am/ bcu gnyis kyi bar du srang btod pa'o// dge slong
130b3: dag gis gnas par byas nas sbyad byed pa bzhin du rto gdod par mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro gdod par bya'o// dge slong dag sgo glegs mi mdzud nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par
130b4: bya'o/ / dbye dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lagazungs gdags par bya'o// yang mi sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o// gcad bka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
130b5: bka' stsal pa/ gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan dang / phred gtan gzhug par bya'o// mun gnag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khur gdod par bya'o// dma' bar btod pan chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dang / seng ge dang /
130b6: stag dang / gung rnams kyis bgrong bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dma' bar gdod pa mi bya'o// mthon po gdod pa na gnang ba mi gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthon por gdod par mi bye bar sum
130b7: gnyis dor bar bya zhing sum gnyis dor nas sum char gdod par bya'o/ / de dag gong du sum gnyis bor te 'og gi sum char 'dod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu sum gnyis bor te gong du sum cha bor bar gdod par bya'o// dge
130b8: slong dag phyi yangs sha re nang rub par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung rgya 'tsho'i rnam pa lta bur gdod par bya ste/ phyi rub la nang yangs par bya'o// pra dang / mchil ba dang / phug ron dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
131a1: stsal pa/ skad khung dra ba can dubyo'o// sbyang bu tre ma bu ka dang / trel ta dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs bzhug par bya'o// rlung gas byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thad gtan gzhug par
131a2: bar bya'o/ / gcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan gzhug par bya'o// dbye ka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu skam ka byas te sred gtan dang / gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan
131a3: dag gis ni gcad par bya'o/ / dbyug gu skam kas ni dbye bar bya'o// der stan dgos par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa'i stegs bu dag bya'o// mkhrang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khri'u bya'o// bcom
131a4: ldan 'das kyis khri'u bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis khri'u ci 'dra ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khor khor yug du khru bzhis 'khor ba'i khri'u bya zhing de thags mas bla bar bya'o// de dag gis thags ma du yod mi shes nas bcom
131a5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thags ma ni lnga ste/ mun dza yi dang / sha na'i dang / gres ma'i dang / ras ma'i dang / spra phra mo'i'o// de dag mkhrang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stan nang tshangs can gding bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
131a6: kyis stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis stan nang tshangs can ci 'dra ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid du khru bzhi pazheng du khru de yod pa nyis ltab tu byas te drub par bya'o// de'i nang du shing bas
131a7: gyis dgang bar bya'o/ / de dag gis shing bal du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing bal dag ni lnga ste/ arga'i shing bal dang / ka shi ka'i shong bal dang / e ra ka'i shing bal dang / spra ba'i shing bal dang / shal ma li'i shing ba la
131a8: dag yin no/ / gzhan yang lnga ste/ bal dang / sha ni'i shing bal dang / ras pal dang / ras ma dang / lo ma'i tshogs dag gis bkang ba dag yan no// shing bal thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'chugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo mdo
131b1: brud bas bya ro rkang gi gzungs gdab par bya'o/ / 'khod pan yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sdus pa/ gdos bu ga dgas par bya'o// ji ltar gdags mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drud pa gtags rten pal
131b2: gnas par bya'o/ / na kang lur das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'askum pa/ dbug gu gzugs par bya'o// dge slong dgang drug gu smrig su bcad 'gro sa bras 'dzugs pa na ma byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skyes pa/ bre'i bcad 'bru
131b3: nas pacom ldan 'das kyis pa/ stsu pa/ ras me ga gas dkyis nas dal grus pa kyi kyis gzugs par byar// da gyu nas ldan 'das kyis pag stsam pa/ mid yang ba ts+tsha/
131b4: dgags sun du du ngas pa da ma ga somadzin 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thag gus btags te 'bang bar bya zhing de nas yang phyir drang bar bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ mdun du mar me gnag par bya'o// 'on kyang
131b5: srung das bcom ldan 'das kyis paka sum pa/ rkang pa gcig brgyad par bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa la gcig kyang byung bar bya'o// 'on kyang mung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ba 'byam pa/
131b6: bcag par bya'o// dge slong dag 'a chag pan 'thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phreng dag la 'jubar bya'o// lag pas chang rgyud byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbu bu bskon la bskud pas btags pa 'jus te ba cag pa/
131b7: bya'o/ mthil wa mdang bcas pas 'dag par byed pa na smra byung nes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshal skam can gyis bcag par ma bya'o// rdul gyis rkang pa gnyis ma du nga ba mi ldan 'das kyis bka'askyam pa/ ba gangag da nga
131b8: rnams par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa'i sum pa da dag sa spong pa'i ku myed pa'i sa dag pa ma par bye/ ma sa gan gis gas ni nang pa gnyis bsgrubar bye'o// dge kyang spang bas kun rgyud
132a1: ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'ga' tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / de dag der mi shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o// 'jog dka' nas bcom ldan 'das
132a2: sa bka' stsal pa/ them skas bya'o// lhung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o// de 'khrul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o// 'on
132a3: kyang mi shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol tu spong khang chen po bya'o// de dag sgo spyod dag tu byed pa na de dag phan tshun dag tu snang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo snol mar gdod par bya'o// sgo khang bya'o// phug kyang /
132a4: bya'o// de dag de na yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo drung du snam bu 'am ras spangs te nyal bar bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de dag de nas song zhing yang phyis 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong spong ba'i
132a5: zhal ka byed pa bsko/ bar bya'o// dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos po yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis bzo ba dang /
132a6: 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / spong ba la dra byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o// dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos
132a7: snga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / spong ba la nyon byas pa dang ma
132a8: byas pa shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhil ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o// 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/ ji dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta byed
132b1: bar sprob ma zhes dri bar bya'o/ / gal te smon das spro zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bshams pabyas nas ga Na DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par
132b2: gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i kal ta bgyi pang sgron gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis
132b3: gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par sgo ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal te bgyid do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge
132b4: 'dun btsun pa rnams bsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spyod ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing dge slong ming 'di zhes ba
132b5: ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'duni gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cad ma gsung shig/
132b6: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong me 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos shing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid
132b7: de 'di ltar bcang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ / dge slong dag ngas dge slong spong ba'i zhab byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas spyod khang du chag chag gdab par bya'o// phyag dar bya'o// lci ba
132b8: sar pa'i byug pas slu bar bya'o/ / stan bsham par bya'o// bshang ba'i sa dang gci ba'i sa byi dor bya'o// chag chag gdab par bya'o// phyag dar bya'o// lci ba sar ba'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o// lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya'o// bong rdog dang / sa dang /
133a1: gzhag par bya'o// de dag re re'i gan du song ste 'bod par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re re nas bod bar mi bya bar gaN DI brdungs par bya'o// des gaN DI rgya cher brdungs pa dang ji tsam na spyod yul gyi grong ma rnams
133a2: chom rkun pa ma 'ongs sam zhes sngangs nas/ de rnams go bgos te lhags nas 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag ma lhags te/ 'di ltar spong bu la rngon byed do// de rnams
133a3: kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rnam par 'tsha ba la tron mdzad kyi/ 'di na smo pag la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gan nI rgya cher brdung bar mi
133a4: bya ste/ 'di ltar gaN NI de ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN DI dang / las k+Shi gan dI dang / shi ba'i gaN DI dang / sprong ba'i ga Na DI dang / gnod pa byung pi'i gaN DI'o// de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i ga Na rI de ni rgyud gsum dang tog gsum mo// las kyi gan DI de ni rgyud/
133a5: gcig dang tog gsum mo// shi ba'i ga Na DI doni bya bo'o// spong ba'i gaN DI da ni khar sil lo// gnod pa byung bi 'gan DI di ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o// de dag dus rting la thug pa ni ci bder byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rting la thug
133a6: na ci bder mi bye bar dus shes par byas nas ci ba der byas te/ dge 'dun las 'tshal ma thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang khrus byas nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du khom pa dang / bsod snyoms pa dang ga yin pa de dag kyang nad lag gnyis bkrus
133a7: nas grong du bsod snyom la 'jug khom par bya'o/ / de dag de kho na bzhin du ci bder byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de kho na bzhin du ci bder mi bya bar rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o// de dag ha cad mang du 'don par
133a8: byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o// de dag ha cang nyung ngur 'don par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha bar nyung ngur gdon par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar ran par gdon par bya'o
133b1: dedag yon bshad par mi byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis sras son pashad par b+ha ba mi shes nas bcom ldan
133b2: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad par bya'o// de dag yon bshad pa ha cang mang du byed nas bcom ldan das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi bye'o// de dag yon bshad pa ha cang nyung ngur
133b3: byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang nyung ngur mi bya ste// 'di ltar yon bshad par ran par bya'o// dge slong spong ba'i zhal te byed pa thams cad kyi ma/ ga du 'dra zhing thams cad kyi 'dun du 'gyes par byed nas/
133b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'gyes par bya zhing thams cad kyi 'dun du 'du bar bya'o// gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na des phyogs dben par lde mig sbas te/ tshe dang
133b5: ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis phye la zhugs sheg ces brjod par bya'o/ / dge slong de spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal
133b6: tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o// bya ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyis gsol pa dang / gsol pa dang gnyis dang / gsol pa dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de 'di ni bya ba zhes bya'o// gso sbyong gang zhe na/ dge slong
133b7: dag das so so thar pa'i mdog don pa ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de khyed kyis deng phyin chad zla ba phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba snyed phyed cing sos thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal
133b8: nas/ / de dag gis sus gdon par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brten gyis zla ba byed phyed cing so so thar po'i ma de gdon pa gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun
134a1: gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed byed cing so sothar pa'i mdo gden pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ slong de/ de'i gnas khang du 'du bar byed pa ni de dag der mi shong ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis
134a2: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du gdon par mi bya'o// de dag khyams su gdon par byed pa na der yang mi shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas la blo shu
134a3: par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis gang la blo mthun par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas thams cad grub
134a4: pa 'am/ byas pa'am/ zin pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa dge 'dun gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo mthun par bya'o// 'di ltar blo mthun par bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa byas nas
134a5: gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig nis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams bsan du gsol/ gnas
134a6: thams cad grub pa 'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyi gnang bar
134a7: mdzod/ ge dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nad mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor gdom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi'o// 'di ni
134a8: gsol ba'o/ / las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gas na du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nad mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dag 'dun gso sbyong gi
134b1: gnas su bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa 'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa na dmatshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo 'thun par bgyi na/ tshe
134b2: dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nad mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo 'thun por bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cing ma gsung
134b3: shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi
134b4: gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye dang /
134b5: gsol pa dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi 'thun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
134b6: @// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ sdom la/ ka ba pin dang chos gos dang / dgrol dang mtshams chung mtshams chen dang // gnang dang bskyung bskyed dgrol ba dang / bcad dang mi 'bral ma bcad dang // grong dgon
134b7: las dang gden pa yi/ / sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka land ka'i gnas na gzhugs so// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pa pa ni rgyal po'i kha ba na sde can
134b8: ma'i bug na gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas dge 'dun dang 'thun par 'jug go/ / de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid kyi che gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing 'thun par gyur nas/ shas tsher tshe dang
135a1: ldan pa bram ze ka ba pi na la bsdod cing 'khod do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze kab bi na 'di snyam du sems te/ de dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong pa nA lnga pa yin la bdag dge slong ka ba pi na'i gso sbyong yang bcwa lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi
135a2: gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myang bar bye 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi
135a3: bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag du 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bye ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya 'am/ 'on te/
135a4: dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/ rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin// btsad ma'i las ni ma dag gyur pa// de yi brtul zhugs
135a5: 'grub par 'gyur/ / zhes bka' stsal bas bdag ni dag tsang mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka ba pi na'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs su chud nas 'od ma' tshal nas mi snang bar mdzad de/
135a6: sde can ma'i phug tu tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka ba pi na'i mdun du bzhugs te 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to/ kab pi na khyod cig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jog pa na 'di snyam du der dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa yin la bdag dge slong ka ba pi
135a7: ne'i gso sbyong yang bcwa lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso slong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan gcig gso sbyong nyams su myod par bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang /
135a8: lhan gcig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bye ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba
135b1: dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su mod par bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su mong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/ rtag tu dag pa
135b2: gso sbyong yin/ btsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa// de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pas bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam du sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa ma byung ngam/ btsun pa byung ngo //
135b3: ka ba bi na khyod re shig dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gron gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi byed na gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/ khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun
135b4: gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro na gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed bdag nyams su myong bar mi byed na gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/ kab bi nad lta bas na khyod dge 'dun
135b5: gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig/ ka ba pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong nyams su mi myong bar ma byed pa ku sa su myong sa byos shig/ kab pa ni khyod dge 'dun gyi bye ba dag dang / khyed dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig/
135b6: kab bi na khyod dge 'dun dang lhan gcig dge 'dun gyi bye ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams du myong bar byed pa gnas su myong ba kyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze g.yin khrid nas gso sbyong gi gnas
135b7: ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gur la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong dag gis gso sbyong gcig/
135b8: pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad pa rjes su gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bcad par/
136a1: bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po phyogs bzhir mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma
136a2: 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par
136a3: bya'o/ / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs sung ya pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/
136a4: lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/
136a5: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ cig pa'i mtshan ma 'am//
136a6: ba'i mtshan pa 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan pa 'amar ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyog
136a7: su yang ga bong gi mtshan pa'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mchan pa 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
136a8: ma brtan por brjod par bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams
136b1: kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtsham ma 'am/ ka ba brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lag
136b2: nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyog su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la ba bcing bzod na dge/
136b3: 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong cig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du dge 'dun gyis grong
136b4: dang grong gnyi 'khor ma rtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug gi bar du mtshams chen po gcad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams bsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na
136b5: dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha gang gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing
136b6: ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po'i lags te/ de'i slad du
136b7: dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa
136b8: la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtsham sa chen po gcod na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg ca
137a1: gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad par bzod pa de dag ni ca ma sung shig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig
137a2: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong
137a3: genya'akhong ma gtogs pa dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal 'thug pa'i bar du mtshams tshon po bcad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa/ der dge slong rnams kyis
137a4: 'dug ste gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gso ba dang / so bad gnyis dang / gsos pa dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi mthun par byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams chos gos gsum thogs te nyin mo spyod du 'dod pa na skyo bar gyur pa'i
137a5: skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams chen po'i nadang dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag mi 'bral ba'i snang ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di ltar
137a6: sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bsham par byas nas ga Na DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gicig gis gsol ba byas te
137a7: las bya'o/ / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na
137a8: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang bral
137b1: bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams
137b2: chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i
137b3: gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag pa de lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams la bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad gyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i
137b4: gnadad bstsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bru
137b5: bar ma 'gyur ba'i gnang bstsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang ma gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong
137b6: rnams snyed g.yogs dang srad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dod par bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / dge sbyong dgal bzhi'i tshigs kyi sa las b+ha ba dag byung shing lnga'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag dang / ban+da'i tshogs kyis lus byung
137b7: dgazung nas/ de dag dge 'dun thams cad sdud par byed pan/ dge slong rnams kyis dge pa'i phyogs yongs su nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
137b8: kyis pan sum pa/ mtshams bcu ga dkyil 'khong bar blo ma thun pa cu'o// di ltar babad par byas// ji da por mtshams chen por dkrol bar bya'o// 'a dadagrol bar byaste// gan mam
138a1: bar byas nas/ gaN N+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par spon pa// dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gi gnyis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
138a2: bsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gdag pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad cig dang / dge 'dun gyis
138a3: mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad do/ / 'dun gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar ba ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams bsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong sdig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen
138a4: bobacad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol ba mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
138a5: shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan pa sum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po bshig cing bkrol lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de'i
138a6: 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur ba btab pa 'am/ sred du bres pa 'am/ rdo gzhag pa 'am/ srol btong ba la sogs pa'i mtshan
138a7: ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/ / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang ser ldeng gi phur ba btab pa'am/ srang bu bres pa 'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//
138a8: de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas ga DI brdung ma te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams
138b1: kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur ba btab pa 'am/ srang bu bres pa'am/ rdog zhag pa'am/ srol ba tod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho
138b2: phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa 'am/ srang bu bres pa 'am/ rdo gzhag pa 'am/ srol gtong ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong ba ga gis
138b3: gsal ba byas te las bya'o/ / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gis phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan pa brjod par byo shad
138b4: phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi bur ba btab pa lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdo gzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni srol btong ba brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod
138b5: nadage 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyis nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung gcod cing dkyil 'khor
138b6: bar blo 'thun par mdzad do/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di ni dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs
138b7: bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni ser ldeng gi phur pa btang ba lags/ lho phyogs su ni bsrad bu bres pa lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdo gzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni krol btor ba brtan po lags te/ de
138b8: slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du tshams bu chung gcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdad na/ tshe dang ldan pa
139a1: gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung gcad cing / dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad par bzod pa
139a2: de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnad nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di ltar gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par
139a3: gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang ma bsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po bcad par bya'o// 'di ltar gcad
139a4: bar bya ste/ je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan
139a5: ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub
139a6: phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pa bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma
139a7: 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gau Na DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug
139a8: cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pa bong gi mtshan pa 'am/ cig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka bi'i mchan
139b1: ma 'am/ shin ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang
139b2: phyogs su yang pi bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ kaM ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs
139b3: pa'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams pas na du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas
139b4: pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni ba bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan
139b5: po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nga phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la babacing
139b6: bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong
139b7: dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa
139b8: dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ brtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka bi mtshan ma 'am shing sngon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags
140a1: nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nad du gso
140a2: spyod gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dkon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po ni gcod
140a3: na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal
140a4: la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnad nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta
140a5: ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye la khong ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/ 'di ltar bcad mi gsung bas dede
140a6: bzhin du 'dzin to/ dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gsol pa dang / gsol pa dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi 'thun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/
140a7: ro// de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par
140a8: bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol pa byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas
140b1: mtshams chen po bcad pa'i las/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i ni dang /
140b2: dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams g.yan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi
140b3: sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gan
140b4: pa stsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas pa'i bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang bstsal bar bzod pa de dag
140b5: niHdam gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gan nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar
140b6: cad mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ / dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang / bcas pas 'dod par bya ste/
140b7: 'di la 'byod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa las bgyid pa gcig gis gsol pa gcig dang / las brjod pa gcig gis mtshams kyi sgo nad dang / slad rol dang bcas pa
140b8: bskyang ba dang bskyed par rung ngam/ nye bar 'khor rung ste/ de la bsgyung ba ni 'di yin te chung ngu'o// de la bskyed pa ni 'di yin te chen po'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ je dang por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya zhing mtshams bu chung yang dgrol bar bya ste/ dkyil
141a1: 'khor ba gzhig par bya'o/ / 'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas ga Na DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong nams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na mtshams gnyigar
141a2: dge 'dun dkod de dge slong las byed pas mtshams gnyi kar shong ngam/ dbyug pa 'am/ seg gam/ re ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun zas gso
141a3: sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chud bcad de/ dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par bgyis pa las/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis
141a4: mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang bzhig te/ dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sngor/
141a5: bas mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de/ dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bgyis pa de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi mtshams chen po gzhi ci mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/ dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang
141a6: dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/ dkyil 'khor ba dkro bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gad dag/ mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du la gnyis lar
141a7: gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang bshig nas dkyil 'khor pa dkrol lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas
141a8: pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ shin ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/
141b1: ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i/
141b2: mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// mtshams bu chu dag
141b3: phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa 'am/ sra bu bres pa 'am/ rdo gzhag pa 'am/ srol gtong ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / rub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang ser
141b4: ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srang bu zos pa 'am/ rdo gzhag pa 'am/ srol gtong ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la
141b5: yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pho bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/
141b6: ka pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ldan pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyabs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang
141b7: pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o//
141b8: mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur ba btab pa 'am/ srang bu bres pa 'am/ rdo gzhog pa 'am/ srol gtor ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /
142a1: byang phyogs su yang med ldeng gi thung ba btab pa 'am/ srid bu bres pa'am/ rdo gzhag pa 'am/ grol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma btan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu mtshams gnyi ga dge 'dun do/ da dge slong las byed par
142a2: mtshams gnyi ga shing dam/ dbyug pa'am/ seg gam/ re ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'din dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen
142a3: po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan mnyan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka pa'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan
142a4: ma 'am/ bya sgribs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ mtshams bu rkyang gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur ba btab pa
142a5: lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad du bres pa lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdo gzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni slo gtod pa brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis
142a6: mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong nams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal
142a7: la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de/ dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gzhan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na
142a8: dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pa bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing
142b1: ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gan po lags/ mtshams bu chung gi phyogs
142b2: bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur ba btab pa lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad bu bris pa lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdog zhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni krol gtod pa brtan po lags te/ de'i skad
142b3: dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la rig par gnas par bgyi ba'i skad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /
142b4: gnas mal la zug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso spyang gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba
142b5: dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de/ dkyil 'khor bar blo'i thun
142b6: par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi bsdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang /
142b7: dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par
142b8: mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dag 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po dang mtshams bu cung bcad de 'akyil 'khor bar blo mthun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste gso sbyong bya zhing dag gang byed/ gsol
143a1: pa dang / gsol pa dang gnyis dang / gsol pa dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi 'thun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gal te 'dod na bskyed pa yang bya'o// gal te mi 'dod na bskyang bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong
143a2: thams cad kyi tshes gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/ / 'di ltar 'byin par bya ste/ mtshams bu chung gi nang nas phyir byung ste/ mtshams chen por gnas mal bshams par byas nas ga Na DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag
143a3: bcwo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams g.yan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad
143a4: ba las/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la babacid bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang
143a5: 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol lo 'di ni gsol ba'o/ / las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong ga ga ci'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge
143a6: 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu
143a7: pa dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig
143a8: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du gadzin to// dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i
143b1: nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod yogs dang sdud logs dang bcas pas 'dod par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as la tshe dang ldan pa nyeb
143b2: 'alar gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa mtshams la bkrum pa'i gnas kyi mtshams gang pags/ nyabar 'khor cig pas bskor ba yin na rtsig pa mtshams yin la/ rtsig pas mi bskor na wakhan/ chu 'jog pa gang dubabapa tshun chad dade/ dge slong de na 'bod pa rnams
143b3: kyis der 'dag sngags spyong bya zhing dag gang bya dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol pa dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi 'thun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis bus
143b4: pa/ btsun pa grong gi mchibs kyi gnas gang lags/ nye ba 'khor nye 'khor gyi mtha' tshun chad de/ dge slong de na 'khod pa rnams kyis der 'dug cing gso sbyong bya zhing dag gang bye dang / gsol pa dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhin
143b5: las bya'o/ / mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun bgrong ma mchis pa'i dgon pa'i gnas kyi mtshams gang lags/ nye ba 'khor rgyang grags kyi ma
143b6: tshun chad de/ dge slong rgyang grags gi nang na 'khod pa thams cad kyis gcig tu 'dug ste/ gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gsol pa dang / gsol pa dang gnyis dang / gsol pa dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi 'thun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
143b7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gso slong gi las du mchis/ nye ba 'khor bzhi ste/ chos ma yin pas mi mthun par byed pa dang / chos ma yin pas mthun par byed pa dang / chos kyis mi 'thun
143b8: par byed pa dang / / chos kyos mthun par byed pa'o// de lags sbyang gi las chos dang ldan pa ni gcig ste// 'di lta ste/ chos kyis 'thun par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa so sor thar
144a1: pa'i mdo gdon pa du mchis/ nye ba 'khor lnga ste/ gsol ba byas te gleng ba ni bton nas lhag ma thos pas sgrogs par byed na dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa nyon cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no// gsol ba byas te gleng bzhin yang ston/ pam
144a2: par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi yang bton nas lhag ma thos pas sgrogs par byed na dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/ / gsol ba byas te gleng bzhi yang bton/ pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi yang bton/ dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos
144a3: bcu gsum yang bton nas lhag ma thos pas sgrogs par byed na dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/ / gsol pa byas te gleng bzhi yang bton/ pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi yang bton/ dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum
144a4: yang bton/ ma nges pa'i chos gnyis kyang bton nas lhag ma thos pas sgrogs par byed na dge 'dun gyi sa so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no// so sor thar pa'i 'don pa rgyas par bton pa ni lnga pa yin no// sdom la/ gnas dang dbyang
144a5: snga phyi ma dang / blo bur ba dang rgyu ba dang // mtshan yol gso sbyong gyis shig dang // sems bskyed pa yis gso sbyong bya// 'di lta ste gnas shig na dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'khod pa de dag 'di ltar dge slong che ge mo zhig la so sor thar pa snang do//
144a6: dge slong che ge mo zhig la so sor thar pa snad do snyam pa las 'di dag gi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la dge slong su la yang so sor thar pa mi sna nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis gnas bstabs pa dang /
144a7: gnas mal btabs pa dang / las bstabs pa dang / rnyed pa stabs pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba bstabs pa dang / dge slong gang la so sor thar pa snang ba gnyer bar bya'o// gal te dge slong gang la so sor thar pa snang ba zhig rnyed na de lta na
144a8: legs 'on te ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis gnas de nyid du gso sbyong gzhan la bsdad par mi bya'o/ / sdod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste gnas shig na dge slong rab tu mang po dag dbyar snga mar gnas par
144b1: khas blang bar 'dod cing de dag 'di ltar dge slong che ga mo zhig la so sor thar pa snang ngo / / dge slong cheg mo zhig la so sor thar ba snang do snyam pa las/ de dag gis gso spyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la dge slong srul yangs sor thar pa mi spang nas bcom ldan
144b2: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis gnas bstabs pa dang / gnas mal bstabs pa dang / las bstabs pa dang / rnyed pa bstabs pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba bstabs pas dge slong gang la so sor thar pa snang ba gnyer
144b3: bar bya'o/ / gal te dge slong gang la so sor thar pa snang ba zhig rnyed na de lta na legs/ 'on te ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis gnas de nyid du dbyar snga mar gnas par khas blang bar mi bya'o// khas len par byed na 'gal tshabs can du
144b4: 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste gnas shig na dge slong rab tu mang po dag dbyar snga mar gnas par khas blangs shing de dag 'di ltar dge slong che ge mo zhig la so sor thar pa snang do// dge slong che ge mo zhig la so sor thar pa snang ngo snyam pa las/ de dag gis
144b5: gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la dge slong sul yang so sor thar mi sna nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis gnas bstabs pa dang / gnas mal bstabs pa dang / las bstabs pa dang / rnyed pa/ bstabs pa dang / bsnyen
144b6: bkur ba stabs pas dge slong gad la so sor thar pa snang ba gnyer bar bya'o/ / gal te dge slong gdal so sor thar pa snang ba zhig brnyed na de lta na legs/ 'on te ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis gnas de nyid du dbyar snga mar gnas par mi bya'o//
144b7: gnas par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste gnas shig na dge slong rab tu mang po dag dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blang bar bdod cing de dag 'di ltar dge slong che ge mo zhig la so sor thar pa snang ngo do// dge slong che ge mo zhig
144b8: pa so sor thar pa snang ngo snyam pa las/ de dag gis gso sbyong pa sna lnga pa de nyid la dge slong su la yang so sor thar pa mi snang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis gnas bstabs pa dang / gnas mal bstabs pa dang / las ga
145a1: padang da pa bsgrubs pa dang / zhin bkur babartas pas dag slong gang las par thar pa snang ba ster ra bya / tedapa slang gangs sas brang snang bzhig ni de ldan legs 'o te ma ded na ges de gagisaganas de'i du tu
145a2: mar gnas par khas blang bar mi bya'o/ / khas len par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste gnas shig na dge slong rab tu mang po dag dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs shing de dag 'di ltar dge slong che ge mo zhig la se sor thar pa snang ngo // dge slong che ge
145a3: mo zhig la so sor thar pa snang ngo snyam pa las de dag gi gso sbyong pa na lnga pa de nyid la dge slong su la yang so sor thar pa mi snang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis gnas de nyid du zla ba gnyis so sor brtags te gnas par bya'o// zla ba
145a4: gnyis 'das nas dge slong de dag gis gnas bstabs pa dang / gau nas mas bstabs pa dang / las bstabs pa dang / rnyed pa bskabs pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba bstabs pas dge slong gang la sor sor thar pa snang ba gnyer bar bya'o// la te dge slong gang la sor sor thar pa
145a5: snang bzhig rnyed na de ltan legs/ 'on te ma snyed na dge slong de dag gis gnas de nyid du gas sbyong gzhan la bsdang bar mi bya'o// bsdod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di
145a6: lta ste dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gis dge slong glo bur rab mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa dag mchi'o zhes thos nas de dag gis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye ba 'khor dge slong de dag gis dge slong glo bu rab mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
145a7: 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang // ma mo 'dzin pa dag gi don du dpag tshad phyed dang gsu ma dubadugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan la sogs bdag gis bsu bar bya'o// gal te 'grub na de ltan legs/ 'on te mi 'grub na rgyang grags lngar gdugs dang / rgyal
145a8: mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dag gis gsu bar bya'o// gal te 'grub na de lta na legs/ 'on te mi 'grub na dpag tshad phyed dam/ rkyang grags gsum ma ma/ rgyang grags sam/ rgyang grags phyed dam/ than khyams su yang gdugs
145b1: dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs bdag gis gsu bar bya'o// dag gis pa shes pa'i tshig gis bsus nas lhung bzed dang chos gos dag blang bar bya'o// khrus bya zhing / dge 'dun la yang snam bag gi rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o// de dag la gnang ba
145b2: pa dang / klanas mal stabs pa dang / las bstabs pa dang / rnyed pa btabab pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba brtabs pa dang / chos mnyan pa sbyin par bya'o// gal te la la zhig den 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rab tu byung ba dag tu 'dra
145b3: na ci'i phyir dge slong de dag la ni mchod par 'os par byed la/ kho bo cig la ni 'os par mi byed ces zer na de la 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa ston pa 'das pa'i gsung rab la 'di ni ston pa'o// 'di ni rten te/ 'di lta ste mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang
145b4: ma mo'o/ / de yang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis rgya cher blags shing thon pas de'i phyir 'di dag ni mchod par 'os pa yin gyi khyod ni ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// 'di lta ste gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /
145b5: gnas dag ljongs rgyur 'dod par 'dod na/ de dag la mkhan po dang slob dpon dag gis rnam pa gang gas kyang gnang bar mi bya'o// gal te rkyen de lta bu zhig byung na tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas che ge mo zhig na dge slong gi dge
145b6: 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas shing dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa nges pa dge ba'i chos can dag 'khod kyis/ de dag gis 'gyod pa ma bskyes pa ni skyed bar
145b7: mi 'gyur ba la bskyes pa ni sel bar 'gyur gyis/ der deng shig ces rjod par bya'o// gal te bstan pa de las gzhan du 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
145b8: ldan 'das gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mtshan mo yol gyis gso
146a1: spyod kyis shig/ de nas dge slong zhig stan la/ langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
146a2: gsol to/ / btsun pa gnas shig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro cha bas che ba zhig mchis na de la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i yongs su dag pa blang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
146a3: kyis de'i yongs su dag pa blang par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar thad par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcig gis gcig gi dang / gcig gis gnyis kyi dang / rab tu mang po rnams
146a4: kyi yang rung ste/ dge 'dun gyi nang du ji snyed kyi ming dag brjod par nus pa'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas dge slong yongs su dag pa 'bul bar byed pa'i kun du spyad pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong yongs su dag pa 'bul bar
146a5: byed pas bla gos grag pa gcig tu gzar te/ mchil lham/ nyis phud nas rgan ramis bzhin du phyag 'tshal te tseg tsog por 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ dang dge 'dun gyi
146a6: gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa lags la/ bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba zo tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bcwa lnga pa lags te/ bdag dge slong bro cha la bsdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgrib bar chad kyi
146a7: chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes bdag mchi'o/ / bdag gi gso sbyong yang yongs su dag ste/ yongs su dag pa yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge slong yongs su dag
146a8: pa 'bul bas/ / la/ lus kyi nam par rig byed kyis yongs su dag pa 'bul bar byed na yongs su dag pa bul bar brjod par bya'o// dag gi rna par rig byed kyis 'bul bar byed na yongs su dag pa phul bar brjod par bya'o// lus kyi rnam par rig
146b1: byed dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis 'bul bar byed na yongs su dag pa bul bar brjod par bya'o/ / lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyis 'bul bar mi byed/ ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis kyang 'bul bar mi byed na dge 'dun
146b2: thams cad der dong par bya'o/ / yang na dge slong de dge 'dun gyi nang du blang bar bya'o// dge 'dun thams cad der dong bar mi byed dam/ dge slong de dge 'dun gyi nang du len par mi byed par mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge
146b3: slong yongs su dag pa 'bul bar byed pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag ngas dge slong yongs su dag pa len pa'i kun du spang ba'i
146b4: chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong yongs su dag pa len pas yongs su dag pa blangs nas brgyug par mi bya'o// bgyogs par mi bya'o// mchod par mi bya'o// phyi rol la mchod par mi bya'o// 'obs la mchong bar mi bya'o// nga ris la
146b5: mchod par mi bya'o/ / steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug par mi bya'o// mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o// gom pa gcig gis skas kyi rim pa gnyis la thod rgal du gzeg par mi bya'o// gos pa gcig gis them sbas kyi them pa
146b6: gnyis la thod rgal du gzeg par mi bya'o/ / chu lkog ma nub tsam la 'bog par mi bya'o// gnyid log par mi bya'o// snyoms par 'jug par mi bya'o// gnyid log par byed pa dang snyoms par 'jug par byed pa ni chu gnyis kyis spang bar bya ba/
146b7: yin te/ ngo tsha med pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma klas pa nyid gang yin pas so// gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyi gnas pa rtan gyi tshe dang ldan pa rag ma lhags pa rnams kyi yongs su dag pa brjod cig/ brjod pa yang rig par gyis shig ces
146b8: smras pa'i tshe des dge slong drung na 'dug pa'i don du 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa lags la/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro
147a1: 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bcwa lnga pa lags te/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag
147a2: go zhes kho na nyid mchi'o/ / de'i gso sbyong yang yongs su dag go// yongs su dag pa yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ yang des dge 'dun gyi dbus su rgan pa'i mtha' 'greng ste bdud pa dang
147a3: bcas pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ der dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa lags la/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba bsdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong
147a4: yang bcwa lnga pa lags te/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba med 'di zhes bgyi ba'i de bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi'o// de'i gso sbyong yang yongs su dag go// yongs su dag pa/
147a5: yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// dge slong yongs su dag pa len pas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
147a6: pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong yongs su dag pa len pas yongs su dag pa blangs te/ de nyid du rgyun chad cing dus bgyid na yongs su dag pa blangs par brjod par bgyi 'am/ ma blangs par brjod par bgyi/ nye ba 'khor ma blangs pa/
147a7: yin te/ yang blang bar bya'o// khyim pa nyid du g.yar gyis 'che bar bgyid dam/ dge tshul nyid dam/ za ma nyid dam/ ma ning nyid dam/ dge slong ma sun phyung ba nyid dam/ ma bsad pa nyid dam/ pa bsad pa nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa nyid dam/ dge
147a8: 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba nyid dam/ mu stegs can nyid dam/ mu stegs can zhugs pa nyid dam/ rku thabs su gnas pa nyid dam/ tha dad par gnas pa nyid dam/ gnas par mi bgyid
147b1: pa nyid du g.yar gyis 'che bar bgyid na yongs su dag pa blangs par brjod par bgyi 'am/ ma blangs par brjod par bgyi/ nye ba 'khor ma blangs pa yin te/ yang blang bar bya'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong yongs su dag pa len pas yongs su dag
147b2: la blangs te/ shul du rgyun chad cing dus bgyid na yongs su dgra pa blangs pa brjod par bgyi 'am/ ma blangs par brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khod ma blangs pa yin te/ yang byung bar bya'o// khyim pa nyid du g.yar gyis 'che bar bgyid dam/ dge tshul nyid dam
147b3: za ma nyid dam/ mi ning nyid dam/ dge slong ma sun byung ba nyid dam/ ma bsad pa nyid dam/ pa bsad pa nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsad pa nyid dam/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung/
147b4: ba nyid dam/ mu stegs can nyid dam/ mu stegs can zhugs pa nyid dam/ rku thabs su gnas pa nyid dam/ tha dad par gnas pa nyi taH/ gnas par mi bgyi ba nyid du g.yar gyis 'tshe bar bgyi na yongs su dag pa blangs par brjod par bgyi
147b5: 'am/ ma blangs par brjod par bgyi/ nye ba 'khor ma blangs pa yin te/ yang blang bar bya'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong yongs su dag pa len pas yongs su dag pa blangs te/ dge 'dun gyi nang du rgyun chad cing dus bgyid na yongs su dag pa
147b6: blangs par brjod par bgyi 'am/ ma blangs par brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor blangs pa yin te/ yang blang bar mi bya'o// khyim pa nyid du g.yar gyis 'che bar bgyid dam/ dge tshul nyid dam/ za ma nyid dam/ ma ning nyid dam/ dge slong ma sun
147b7: byung ba nyid dam/ ma bsad pa nyid dam/ pa bsad pa nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa nyid dam/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen pa byas pa nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag byung ba nyid dam/ mu stegs can nyid dam/ mu stegs
147b8: can zhugs pa nyid dam/ rku thabs su gnas pa nyid dam/ tha dad par gnas pa nyid dam/ gnas par mi bgyi ba nyid du g.yar gyis 'che bar bgyid na yongs su dag pa blangs par brjod par bgyi 'am/ ma blangs par brjod par bgyi/
148a1: nye ba 'khor blangs pa yin te/ yang blang bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas gang na dge slong gcig pu mchis pa des gse steng bcwa lnga pa de nyid la
148a2: dza ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye ba 'khor dge slong des gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya/ phyag dar bya/ b.lang gi lci bsar pa'i thug pas byug par bya/ seng ge'i khri bshams par bya/ stan pa sham par bya/ mar mo gzugs par bya/
148a3: chos mnyan pa sbyin par bya'o// de'i 'og tu phyogs ches mthon por 'dug ste phyogs bzhir bsdu bar bya'o// der dge slong yongs su dag pa lta ba 'thun pa la la dag 'ong na 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag myur ba myur bsashog shig/ deng dge 'dun
148a4: gyi gso sbyong bcwo lnga pa yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing de dag dang lhan cig 'dug ste gso sbyong bya'o/ / gal te 'grub na de lta na legs/ ji ste mi 'grub na dge slong des rang gi stan la 'dug ste/ ded dge 'dun gyi gas sbyong bcwa lnga pa yin la/
148a5: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bcwa lnga pa yin te/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kyang bdag smras/ bdag yongs su dag par lha rnams kyis gzung du gsol/ bdag dge
148a6: snod ming 'di zhes bya bas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dreng gso sbyong byin gyis brlab bo/ / gang gi tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gas sbyong rgya cher nyams su myong bar bya zhib
148a7: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu'ang brjod par bya'o/ / de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ gang na dge slong gnyis 'khod pa der ni rim pa de nyid kyis
148a8: gcig la gcig brjod par bya'o/ / gang na dge slong gsum 'khod pa der yang rim pa der nyid kyis gcig la gcig brjod par bya'o// gang na dge slong bzhi pa 'khod pa der ni de rnams kyis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya'o// der ni nang
